about_the_game:
Wolfheart is a short side-story regarding the events that took place long before the original game. Here we take a glimpse into the past to better understand the future, recite the many names of the very first Carminrot to become a gift bearer, and the old oaths to keep it at bay.

This free DLC includes:
  • an old legend that gets you deeper into the lore;
  • bits and pieces about how the first Order came to be;
  • some characters you will — or have already met — in other DLCs and the main game.

short_description: It all began with the wind and the howling. A kind heart wants to save the child from the beast, the world from disaster. Mother's heart wants to be with her baby. Here is the story about the heart of a wolf — who dares to stand against it?
